segments.text: I'm just taking in this ordinary kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink with her apron on, handling the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly to the side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in daylight, showing the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets open, revealing the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, one hand in the jar, the other with a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl standing nearby, arm raised toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water running from the faucet into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor by the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems positioned just so in the drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a straightforward view of the room's activities.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The angled perspective highlights both sides well.
segments.speaker: PAR
